p4a.plonevideo
==============

Overview
--------

The *p4a.plonevideo* package is an integration component for integrating
the *p4a.video* framework onto the Plone platform.  It was inspired by
the Plone ATVideo product and even borrows some UI.

Maintainer
----------

Rocky Burt (rocky AT serverzen DOT com) is the active maintainer of the
*p4a.plonevideo* component.
